Subject: Server Update Backout Plan
Description:
Hi There,

Just a quick question if you don't mind?

I am looking to update our Server Version next week, though to put this through our Change Board, we are required to provide a backout plan where possible.

If the worst came to the worst and a new server version was not suitable for us, would you be able to roll back to a previous version on your end (as you host the server for us) or would this not be possible?

Many Thanks for your time,
Conor
Solution_Comment__c: answered all of the cstomer's concerns regarding roll-backs
